title: Microsoft now offers "Complete" warranty plans for HoloLens, Surface Book, and more
text:
Microsoft now offers "Complete" warranty plans for HoloLens, Surface Book, and more 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
Following the October 6th event and tons of new products, Microsoft has updated its warranty offerings, adding plans for HoloLens, Surface B...
